GK19bahcar7u:1: aṅganavedī vasudhā kulyā jaladhiḥ sthalī ca pātālam /
GK19bahcar7u:3: dhṛtadhanuṣi bāhuśālini śailā na namanti yattadāścaryam /
GK19bahcar7u:5: atha vyīteṣu ca keṣuciddivaseṣu mauhūrtikamaṇḍalena śataśaḥ sugaṇite supraśaste 'hani
GK19bahcar7u:6: datte catasṛṇāmapi diśāṃ vijayayogye daṇḍayātrālagne salilamokṣaviśāradaiḥ śāradairivāmbhodharaiḥ
GK19bahcar7u:7: kāladhautaiḥ śātakaumbhaiśca kumbhaiḥ snātvā viracayya paramayā bhaktyā bhagavato
GK19bahcar7u:9: dattvā dvijebyo ratnavanti rājatāni jātarūpamayāni ca sahasraśastilapātrāṇi kanakapatralatālaṅkṛtaśaphaśṛṅgaśikharā gāścārbudaśaḥ,
GK19bahcar7u:10: samupaviśya vitatavyāghracarmaṇi bhadrāsane vilipya prathamaviliptāyudho nijayaśodhavalenācaraṇataścandanena śarīraṃ,
GK19bahcar7u:15: paripūjitaprahṛṣṭapurohitakaraprakīryamāṇaśāntisalilasīkaranikarābhyukṣitaśirāḥ saṃpreṣya mahārhāṇi vāhanāni bahalaratnālokaliptakakubhi ca bhūṣaṇāni bhūbhujāṃ savibhajya,
GK19bahcar7u:20: nātidūre ca nagarādupasarasvati nirmite mahati tṛṇamaye,
GK19bahcar7u:27: tatrasthasya cāsya grāmākṣapaṭalikaḥ sakalakaraṇiparikaraḥ “karotu devo divasagrahaṇamadyaivāvandhyaśāsanaḥ
GK19bahcar7u:28: śāsanānām' ityabhidhāya vṛṣāṅkāmabhinavaghaṭitāṃ hāṭakamayīṃ mudrāṃ samupaninye /
GK19bahcar7u:30: samupasthāpite ca prathamata eva mṛtpiṇḍe paribhraśya karakamalādadhomukhī mahītale papāta mudrā /
GK19bahcar7u:31: mandāśyānapaṅkapaṭale mṛdumṛdi sarasvatītīre parisphuṭaṃ vyarājanta rājayo varṇānām /
GK19bahcar7u:32: amaṅgalāśaṅkini ca viṣīdati parijane narapatirakaronmanasyetat--“atattvadarśinyo hi bhavantyavidagdhānāṃ dhiyaḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:33: tathā hi--ekaśāsanamudrāṅkā bhūrbhavato bhaviṣyatīti niveditamapi nimittenānyathā gṛhṇanti grāmyāḥ' /
GK19bahcar7u:34: ityabhinandya manasā mahānimittaṃ tatsīrasahasrasaṃmitasīmnāṃ grāmāṇāṃ śatamadād dvijebhyaḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:37: atha galati tṛtīye yāme suptasamastasanattvaniḥśabde dikkuñjarajṛmbhamāṇagambhīradhvaniratāḍhyata prayāṇapaṭahaḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:38: agrataḥ sthitvā ca muhūrtamiva punaḥ prayāṇakrośasaṃkhyāpakāḥ spaṣṭamaṣṭāvadīyanta prahārāḥ paṭahe paṭīyāṃsaḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:40: prayāṇapaṭahaḥ agrataḥ sthitvā ca muhūrtamiva punaḥ prayāṇakrīśasaṃkhyāpakāḥ spaṣṭamaṣṭāvadīyanta
GK19bahcar7u:114: udite ca bhagavati dinakṛti rājñaḥ samāyogagrahaṇasamayaśaṃsī sasvāna saṃjñāśaṅkho muhurmuhuḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:115: atha na cirādiva prathamaprayāṇa eva digvijayāya diggajasamāgamamiva gamanavilolakarṇatāladolāvilāsaiḥ kurvāṇayā kareṇukayā siddhayātrayohyamānaḥ,
GK19bahcar7u:118: dvitīya iva bhogināmadhipatiraṅgalagnena kañcukenāmṛtamathanadivasa iva kṣīrodaphenapaṭaladhavalāmbaravāhī,
GK19bahcar7u:121: savitāramapi pibanniva tejasā bahalatāmbūlasindūracchuritayā vilabhamāna iva dvīpāntarāṇyoṣṭhamudrayānurāgasya
GK19bahcar7u:123: rājakekṣaṇotkṣiptatribhāgayā trīnapi lokān karadānāyājñāpayanniva savibhramaṃ bhrūlatayā
GK19bahcar7u:124: drāghīyasā bāhuprākāreṇa parikṣipanniva rirakṣayā saptāpi sāgaramahākhātānakhilamiva
GK19bahcar7u:126: gāḍhamamṛtamaya iva pīyamānaḥ kutūhalottānakaṭakalokalocanasahasraaiḥ snehārdreṣu rājñāṃ hṛdayeṣu guṇagauraveṇa majjanniva,
GK19bahcar7u:129: puraḥsarairālokakārakaiḥ sahasrasaṃkhyairarka iva kiraṇairadhikāracāturyacañcalacaraṇairvyavasthāsthāpananiṣṭhuraiḥ bhayapalāyamānalokotpīḍāntaritā dasāpi diśo grāhayadbhiriva,
GK19bahcar7u:138: prabhāmucāṃ cūḍāmaṇīnāmavāñcastiryañca udañcaśca cañcanto marīcayaścāparāśaya iva suśakunasaṃpādanāya celuḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:139: meghāyamānareṇumeduraṃ mandiraśikhaṇḍina iva khamuḍḍīyamānāḥ komalakalpapādapapallavavandanamālāḥ kalāpā ivābadhyanta digdvāreṣu dikpālaiḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:142: mānamayān prāṇān praṇayadānaiḥ pravīrāṇāṃ vīro yathānurūpaṃ vibabhāja rājakam /
GK19bahcar7u:143: atha prasthite rājani bahalakalakalatrastadiṅnāgaśūtkārarava ivetastatastastāra tāratarastūryāṇāṃ pratidhvanirāśātaṭeṣu /
GK19bahcar7u:144: diggajebhyaḥ prakupitānāṃ triprasrutānāṃ kariṇāṃ madaprasravaṇavīthībhiralikulakālībhiḥ kālindīveṇikāsahasrāṇīva sasyandire /
GK19bahcar7u:152: aripratāpānalanirmūlanāyeva madoṣmaśīkaraiḥ śiśekire kariṇaḥ kakubhāṃ cakram /
GK19bahcar7u:154: svayamapi visiṣmiye balānāṃ bhūpālaḥ sarvatovikṣiptacakṣuścādrākṣīdāvāsasthānasakāśāt pratiṣṭhamānaṃ svandhāvāram,
GK19bahcar7u:161: bhadra, bhagnacaraṇa iva saṃcarasiyāvadamī puraḥsarāḥ sarabhasamupari patanti /
GK19bahcar7u:166: rajasi yathā na nasyasi tathā samīpe bhava,
GK19bahcar7u:219: phalakāle 'nya eva viṭāḥ samupasthāsyante' iti mukharaiḥ pade pade patatāṃ durbalabalīvardānāṃ niyuktaiḥ skhalane khalaceṭakeḥ khedyamānāṃsaṃvibhaktakulaputralokam,
GK19bahcar7u:227: aparairlūyamānaniṣpannasasyaprakaṭitaviṣādaiḥ kṣetraśucā sakuṭumbakaireva nirgataiḥ prarūḍhaprāṇacchedaiḥ paritāpatyājitabhayaiḥ “vka rājā, kuto rājā?
GK19bahcar7u:246: dṛsyamānasakalaprāṇiparyāyaṃ caturyugasargakośamiva prajāpatīnāṃ kleśabahulamapi tapaḥkaraṇamitra kramakāriṇaṃ kalyāṇānām,
GK19bahcar7u:248: āsannavartināṃ ca “tatrabhavatā māndhātrā pravartitāḥ panthāno digvijayāya /
GK19bahcar7u:249: apratihataratharaṃhasā raghuṇā laghunaiva kālenākāri kakubhāṃ prasādanam /
GK19bahcar7u:253: sahimahimavadvyavahito 'pyuvāha bāhubalavyatikarakātaraḥ karaṃ kauraveśvarasya kiṅkara ivākṛtī drumaḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:254: nātijigīṣavaḥ khalu pūrve yenālpa eva bhūbhāge bhūyāṃso bhagadattadantavakrakrāthakarṇakau ravaśiśupālasālvajarāsaṃdhasindhurājaprabhṛtayo 'bhavan bhūpatayaḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:255: saṃtuṣṭo rājā yudhiṣṭhiro yo hyasahata samīpa eva dhanañjayajayajanitajagatkampaḥ kiṃpuruṣāṇāṃ rājyam /
GK19bahcar7u:256: alasaścaṇḍakośo yo na prāvikṣat kṣmāṃ jitvā strīrājyam /
GK19bahcar7u:263: dakṣiṇārṇavakallolānilacalitacandanalatāsaurabhasundarīkṛtadarīmand irāddardurādadrernedīyasi malayo malayalagna eva ca mahendraḥ' /
GK19bahcar7u:265: mandiradvāri cobhayataḥ sabahumānaṃ brūlatābhyāṃ visarjitarājalokaḥ praviśya cāvatatāra bāhyāsthānamaṇḍapasthāpitamāsanamācakrāma /
GK19bahcar7u:268: prāgjyotiṣeśvareṇa kumāreṇa prahito haṃsaveganāmā dūto 'ntaraṅgastoraṇamadhyāste' iti /
GK19bahcar7u:270: atha dakṣatayā kṣitipālādarācca pratīhāraḥ svayameva niragāt /
GK19bahcar7u:275: “ehyehi' iti sabahumānamāhūtaśca pradāvito 'pasṛtaḥ pādapīṭhaluṭhitalalāṭalekho nyastahastaḥ pṛṣṭhe pārthivenopasṛtya bhūyo namaścakre /
GK19bahcar7u:277: tato rājā tiraścīṃ tanumīṣadiva dadhānaścāmaragrāhiṇīmantarālavartinīṃ samutsārya saṃmukhīnastaṃ sapraśrayaṃ papraccha--“haṃsavega/
GK19bahcar7u:279: sa tamanvavādīt--“adya kuśalī yenaivaṃ snehasnapitayā sauhārdadravārdrayā sagauravaṃ girā pṛcchati devaḥ' iti /
GK19bahcar7u:281: devasya sadbhāvagarbhamapahāya hṛdayamekamanyadanurūpaṃ prābhṛtameva durlabhaṃ loke
GK19bahcar7u:284: tathā hi--pratidivasaṃ praviśati śaityahetośchāyāyāḥ kiraṇasahasrādekaikaḥ somasya raśmirasmin /
GK19bahcar7u:285: yasminpraviṣṭe pradhyānānantaraṃ svādavo dantavīṇopadeśācāryāścyotanticandrabhāsāmambhasāṃ maṇiśalākābhyo yāvadicchamacchā dhārāḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:286: pracetā iva yaścaturṇāmarṇavānāmadhipatirbhūto bhāvī vā tamidamanugṛhṇāti cchāyayā netaram /
GK19bahcar7u:292: etattāvadanugṛhṇātu dṛśā devaḥ saṃdeśamapi visrabdhaṃ śroṣyati' /
GK19bahcar7u:295: sa ca vacanānantaramutthāya pumānūrdhvīcakāra taddhautadukūlakalpitācca nicolakādakoṣīt /
GK19bahcar7u:296: ākṛṣyamāṇa eva ca yasminnatisitamahasi sarabhasamahāsīva hareṇa,
GK19bahcar7u:301: atrinetranirgatasya dhavaladhāmamaṇḍalamanoharo dṛṣṭa iva janena janmadivasaḥ kumudabandhoḥ pratyakṣīkṛta ivodgamanakṣaṇo nārāyaṇanābipuṇḍarīkasya,
GK19bahcar7u:308: citrīyamāṇacetāśca sarājako rājā daṇḍānusārādhirohiṇyā dṛṣṭyā sādaramaikṣiṣṭa tattiṃlakamiva tribhuvanasya,
GK19bahcar7u:315: bahalajyotsnāśuklodaramaindavamiva pariveṣavalayaṃ śauklyāpahasitaśaṅkhaśrīkaṃ śravaṇamaṇḍalamiva niścalatāṃ gatamairāvatasya,
GK19bahcar7u:319: sparśavatā ca prabhāvastambhitena mandākinīmṛṇālena mukulitaphaṇena vāsukineva nītena daṇḍatāṃ dyotamānam,
GK19bahcar7u:330: dṛṣṭe tasmin rājñā prathame śeṣamapi prābhṛtaṃ prakāśayāñcakruḥ krameṇa kārmāḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:340: priyaṅguprasavapiṅgalatvañci cāsanāni vetramayānyaguruvalkalakalpitasañcayāni ca subhāṣitabhāñji pustakāni,
GK19bahcar7u:341: pariṇatapāṭalapaṭolatviṃṣi ca taruṇahārītaharinti kṣīrakṣārīṇi ca pūgānāṃ pallavavalambīni sarasāni phalāni,
GK19bahcar7u:350: kutūhalakṛnti ca kanakaśṛṅkhalāniyamitagrīvāṇāṃ kiṃnnarāṇāṃ ca vanamānuṣāṇāṃ ca jīvañjīvakānāṃ ca jalamānuṣāṇāṃ ca mithunāni,
GK19bahcar7u:355: rājā tu chatradarśanātprahṛṣṭahṛdayaḥ prathamaprayāṇe śobhananimitamiti manasā jagrāha /
GK19bahcar7u:357: sakalaratnadhāmnaḥ paramesvaraśirodhāraṇārhasyāsya mahātapatrasya mahārṇavādiva kumudabāndhavasya kumārāllābho na vismāya /
GK19bahcar7u:361: svayamapyutthāya snātvā maḍgalākāṅkṣī prāṅmukhaḥ prāviśadābhogasya chāyām /
GK19bahcar7u:362: atha viśata evāsya chāyājanmanā jaḍimnā cūḍhāmaṇitāmanīyateva śaśibimbamambubindumucaścucumburiva
GK19bahcar7u:363: candrakāntamaṇayo lalāṭataṭaṃ karpūrareṇava iva vyalīyanta locanayūgale gale galattuhinakaṇanikarakṛtanīhārā
GK19bahcar7u:368: candanamahgaspṛṣṭe ca vāsasī śarattārakākāratāramuktāstabakitapadaṃ pariveśaṃ nāma
GK19bahcar7u:369: kaṭisūtrakam atimahārhapajharāgālokalohitīkṛtadivasaṃ ca taraṅgakaṃ nāma karṇābharaṇaṃ
GK19bahcar7u:374: mukulāyamānasakalakamalavanā pramukha eva baddhasevāñjalipuṭeva sadvīpā bhūrabhūd bhūpateḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:381: prayāṇavārtā iva māninīnāṃ hṛdayabhedinyo yayurindudīdhitayo daśa diśaḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:383: cinteva bhūbhṛtāṃ hṛdayāni viveśa guhāvivarāṇi vimuktasarvāśātimirasaṃtatiḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:385: asyāṃ ca velāyāṃ vitatavitānatalavartī narendro “yāta tāvat' iti visarjyānujīvino haṃsavegamādiṣṭavān--“kathaya saṃdeśam' iti /
GK19bahcar7u:387: purā mahāvarāhasaṃparkasaṃbhūtagarbhayā bhagavatyā bhuvā narako nāma sūnurasāvi rasātale /
GK19bahcar7u:389: yasya ca tribhuvanabhujo bhujaśauṇḍasya bhavanakamalinīcakravākīkopakuṭilakaṭākṣekṣito 'pi bhayacakitāruṇaparivartitaratho nājñayā vinā ravirastamavrājīt
GK19bahcar7u:392: mahatsu mahīpāleṣu pramautro mahārājabhūtivarmaṇaḥ pautraścandramukhavarmaṇaḥ putro
GK19bahcar7u:393: devasya kailāsasthirasthiteḥ sthitivarmaṇaḥ susthiravarmā nāma mahārājādhirājo jajñe
GK19bahcar7u:394: tejasāṃ rāśirmṛgāṅka iti yaṃ janā jaguḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:396: yaśca bāla eva prītyā dvijātīnaprītyā cārātīnsamagrānpratigrahānagrāhayat /
GK19bahcar7u:398: tathā ca yo vāhinīnāthānāṃ śaṅkhāñjahāra na ratnāni,
GK19bahcar7u:401: tasya ca sugṛhītanāmno devasya devyāṃ śyāmādevyāṃ bhāskaradyutirbhāskaravarmāparanāmā tanayaḥ saṃtanorbāgīrathyāṃ bhīṣma iva kumāraḥ samabhavat
GK19bahcar7u:402: ayamasya ca śaiśavādārabya saṃkalpaḥ stheyānsthāṇupādāravindadvayādṛte nāhamanyaṃ
GK19bahcar7u:404: sakalabuvanavijayena vā mṛtyunā vā yadi vā prajaṇḍapratāpajvalanajanitadigdāhena
GK19bahcar7u:408: devasya hi yaśāṃsi sañcicīṣato bahiraṅgabhūtāni dhanāni /
GK19bahcar7u:409: bāhāveva ca kevale niṣaṇṇasya śeṣāvayavānāmapi sāhāyakasaṃpādanamanoratho niravakāśaḥ kimuta bāhyajanasya /
GK19bahcar7u:419: yadi ca devasyāpi maitrīyati hṛdayamavagacchati ca paryāyāntaritaṃ dāsyamanutiṣṭhanti
GK19bahcar7u:420: suhṛda iti tataḥ kimāsyate samājñāpyatāmanubhavatu viṣṇormandaragiririva vikaṭakeyūrakoṭimaṇivighaṭṭanavkaṇitakaṭakamaṇiśilāśakalāni
GK19bahcar7u:423: nābhinandati ceddevaḥ praṇayamājñāpayatu kiṃ kathanīyaṃ mayā svāmina' iti /
GK19bahcar7u:425: sudūramābhogātapatravyatikareṇa tu parāṃ koṭimāropite premṇi lajjamāna iva sādaraṃ
GK19bahcar7u:427: kathamiva tādṛśi mahātmani mahābhijane puṇyarāśau guṇīnāṃ prāgrahare parokṣasuhṛdi snihyati madvidhasyānyathā svapne 'pi pravarteta manaḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:428: sakalajagaduttāpanapaṭavo 'pi śiśirāyante tribuvananayanānandakare kamalākare karāstigmatejasaḥ. subahuguṇakrītāsca ke vayaṃ sakhyasya /
GK19bahcar7u:431: śreyāṃśca saṃkalpaḥ kumārasya svayaṃ bāhuśālī mayi ca samālambitaśarāsane suhṛdi harādṛte kamanyaṃ namasyati /
GK19bahcar7u:433: avalepini paśāvapi kesariṇi bahumāno hṛdayasya kiṃ punaḥ suhṛdi /
GK19bahcar7u:434: tattathā yateṣāḥ yathā na ciramiyamasmānkleśayati kumāradarśanotkaṇṭhā' iti /
GK19bahcar7u:440: paśyatu devaḥ puruṣasya hi sevāṃ prati durjananyevātivṛddhayā durgatyā vābhimukhīkriyamāṇasya,
GK19bahcar7u:446: sakalaśarīrasaṃtāpakaraṃ karīṣāgnimiva duṣkṛtinaḥ kṛtacittsya saṃpraveṣṭuṃ rājakulamupahatasakalendriyaśakteriva mithyaiva hṛdayagataviṣayagrāmagrahaṇābhilāṣasya,
GK19bahcar7u:463: balibhuja iva jihvālaulyopayuktapuruṣavarcaso vṛthā vihitāyuṣo jīvitaḥ,
GK19bahcar7u:464: śmaśānapādapāniva piśācaraya dagdhabhūtyā paruṣīkṛtānrājavallabhānupasarpataḥ viparītajihvājanitamādhuryairoṣṭhamātraprakaṭitarāgai rājaśukālāpaiḥ śiśoriva mugdhavilobhyamānasya,
GK19bahcar7u:473: atikṛpaṇasya śirasā kevalenāsaṃtuṣṭasya vacasāpi pādau spṛśataḥ,
GK19bahcar7u:506: prabalapaṅka iva sarvamadhastānnayati dāruṇo dāsaśabdaḥ dhiktaducchvasitamupayātu nidhanaṃ dhanam,
GK19bahcar7u:508: tiṣṭhatu dūra eva sā śrīḥ śivaṃ sa paricchadaḥ karotu yadarthamuttamāṅgaṃ gā gamiṣyatyaśāpānugrahakṣamastapasvī
GK19bahcar7u:522: varākaḥ sevako 'pi martyamadhye rājilo 'pi vā bhogī,
GK19bahcar7u:524: varaṃ kṣaṇamapi kṛtā mānavatā mānavatā na mato namatastrailokyādhirājyopabhogo 'pi manasvinaḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:525: tadevamabhinanditāsmadīyapraṇayo devo 'pi divasaiḥ katipayaireva parāgataḥ prāgjyotiṣeśvara iti karotu cetasi' ityuktvā tūṣṇīmabhūt /
GK19bahcar7u:529: prabāte ca prabhūtaṃ pratiprābhṛtaṃ pradhānapratidūtādhiṣṭhitaṃ dattvā haṃsavegaṃ prāhiṇot /
GK19bahcar7u:531: kadācittu rājyavardhanabhujabalopārjitamaśeṣaṃ mālavarājasādhanamādāyāgataṃ samīpa evāvāsitaṃ lekhahārakādbhaṇḍimaśṛṇot /
GK19bahcar7u:535: atha bhaṇḍirekenaiva vājinā katipayakulaputraparivṛto malinavāsā ripuśaraśalyapūritena nikhātabahulohakīlakaparikararakṣitasphuṭaneneva hṛdayena,
GK19bahcar7u:552: avanipatirapi dṛṣṭvā tamutthāya praviralaiḥ padaiḥ pratyudgamyotthāpya ca gāḍhamupagūhya kaṇṭhe karuṇamaticiraṃ ruroda /
GK19bahcar7u:559: deva bhūyaṃ gate deve rājyavardhane guptanāmnā ca gṛhīte kuśasthale devī rājyaśrīḥ paribhraśya bandhanādvindhyāṭavīṃ saparivārā praviṣṭeti lokato vārtāmaśṛṇavam /
GK19bahcar7u:560: anveṣṭārastu tāṃ prati prabhūtāḥ prahitā janā nādyāpi nivartante' iti /
GK19bahcar7u:561: taccākarṇya bhūpatirabravīt--“kimanyairanupadibiḥ yatra sā tatra parityaktānyakṛtyaḥ svayamevāhaṃ yāsyāmi /
GK19bahcar7u:567: athāparedyuruṣasyeva bhaṇḍirbhūpālamupasṛtya vyajñāpayat--“paśyatu devaḥ śrīrājyavardhanabhujabalārjitaṃ sādhanaṃ saparibarhaṃ mālavarājasya' iti /
GK19bahcar7u:584: athālocya tatsarvamavanipālaḥ svīkartuṃ yathādhikāramādiśadadhyakṣān anyasmiṃścāhani hayaireva svasāramanveṣṭumuccacāla vindhyāṭavīmavāpa ca parimitaireva prayāṇakaistām /
GK19bahcar7u:617: nāticiroddhṛtānāṃ ca dhātutviṣāṃ dhātakīkusumānāṃ goṇīragaṇitāḥ picavyānāṃ cātasīgaṇapaṭṭamūlakānāṃ puṣkalānsaṃbārān,
GK19bahcar7u:619: khadirakāṣṭhānāṃ kuṣṭhasya kaṭhorakesarisaṭābhārababhruṇaśca rodhrasya bhūyaso bhārakān,
GK19bahcar7u:640: iti śrīmahākavibāṇabhaṭṭakṛtau harṣacarite chatralabdhirnāma saptama ucchvāsa
